root.name: Danger Mouse in Double Trouble
root.description: Overview Danger Mouse in Double Trouble is the first game in a series of games based on the cartoon character Danger Mouse. The other games are Danger Mouse in the Black Forest Chateau and Danger Mouse in Making Whoopee . The game itself consists of three distinct stages so that Danger Mouse can get to Baron Greenback's lair and stop him activating an evil android version of Danger Mouse. The first level has Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold in their aerocar destroying oncoming robots. The second level has the characters traveling through a jungle avoiding various creatures. The third and final level is the showdown in the lair of Baron Greenback which has Danger Mouse using rows of buttons to control lights so that the android can be stopped from activating.
